Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The R496H mutation of arylsulfatase A does not cause metachromatic leukodystrophy .

Let's think step by step.

1. Metachromatic leukodystrophy: This is the only disease entity mentioned in the paragraph. It is a rare inherited disorder that affects the nervous system by causing damage to the protective covering of nerve cells (myelin sheath). The R496H mutation of arylsulfatase A does not cause this disease.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
